title: may 3: Anne Frank and the secret annex
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia tells the story of Anne Frank, a Jewish teenager who perished in the Holocaust. Anne spent two years hiding in a secret annex in a house in Amsterdam, and documented her time in hiding in a journal. Maia will discuss her life, tragic death at a Nazi concentration camp, and the impact of her diary and story. Afterwards, Maia talks about the album that made Fall Out Boy go mainstream. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
